alert.note: Alert for Ogle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 08 at 10:25AM CDT until August 14 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING PREVIOUSLY IN EFFECT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of north central Illinois, including the following area, Ogle County. * WHEN...Until 130 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water. It will take several hours for all the water from earlier storms to work through local drainage systems in urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1021 AM CDT, street flooding continued in the warned area ongoing due to earlier thunderstorms. Between 2 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Byron, Oregon, Mount Morris, Davis Junction, Forreston, Stillman Valley, Lindenwood, Monroe Center, Leaf River, Adeline and Baileyville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roadways.
